body: I'm buying a new goldfish in 2 days. Which avicus player (preferably female, as I hope to get a female goldfish to breed it with my others) should I name it after?
body_tagged: I'm buying a new goldfish in 2 days. Which avicus player (preferably female, as I hope to get a female goldfish to breed it with my others) should I name it after?
title: I need help

replies.body:
KooDa (that actually doesnt sound bad)










Ps
Dont know if koo is a guy....

replies.body:
Koo is a guy:D (I think)
Call them "Ivy" and "Howseh"
If you want a forumban you can ask them (Ivy and Howseh)

replies.body: Hey TheTrail! As super excited as you are about your goldfish purchase, try to keep personal updates such as this off the forums. Thanks :)
